org.drip.analytics.rates

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.rates.Turn

  • public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
    Turn implements rate spread at discrete time spans. It contains the turn amount and the start/end turn spans.
